# Multi-group Comparisons

### Anova

```{r}
n <- 1000

set.seed(123)

x <- rnorm(n, 1)
y <- rnorm(n, 1.2)
z <- rnorm(n, 1.1)

dat <- data.frame(outcome = c(x,y,z),
                  group = rep(c("X","Y","Z"), each = n))

fit <- aov(outcome ~ group, data = dat)

summary(fit)
```

### PostHoc Test


```{r}
TukeyHSD(fit, ordered = TRUE)
```
